title: Sampler, 1817
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, stem, long-armed cross, four-sided, chain, eyelet, running, back, and wrapped stitches on plain weave foundation
description: In the center, a double-headed eagle and the shield of Castile Leon, framed by the inscription. With deep borders of geometric pattern bands. Trimmed with four green tassels.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1817.
1817. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, stem, long-armed cross, four-sided, chain, eyelet, running, back, and wrapped stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-415.
